author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Nextdc Sees Fy18 Underlying EBITDA Between $58 Mln To $62 Mln
text:
Feb 23 (Reuters) - Nextdc Ltd:
* SEES FY18 CAPEX BETWEEN $220 MILLION TO $240 MILLION * HY ‍REVENUE UP 32% TO $77.5 MILLION​ * HY PROFIT AFTER TAX OF $8.4 MILLION VERSUS $19.3 MILLION * SEES ‍FY18 REVENUE BETWEEN $152 MILLION TO $158 MILLION​ * SEES FY18 UNDERLYING EBITDA BETWEEN $58 MILLION TO $62 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
